oracle text:
10/10
Indestructible, Flying, Trample

Whenever Cthulhu attacks or blocks, each player puts their top ten cards of their library into their graveyard.

Whenever Cthulhu deals combat damage to a player, you may return up to two creature cards from any graveyard to the battlefield under your control. They are Eldrazi in addition to their other types.

When Cthulhu is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles their graveyard into their library.

*"Ph'nglui mglw'nafh Cthulhu R'lyeh wgah'nagl fhtagn."*
Translation: "In his house at R'lyeh dead Cthulhu waits dreaming."
